sentences.en: A mouse and a louse are living in the house.
sentences.cn: 一只老鼠和一只虱子生活在一间房子里.

sentences.en: A NEW SPECIES OF SUCKING LOUSE FROM GRICRTULUS LONGICAUDATUS MILNE - EDWARDS ( ANOPLURA: POLYPLACIDAE )
sentences.cn: 青海长尾仓鼠吸虱一新种 ( 吸虱亚目: 多板虱科 )

sentences.en: A parasitic louse ( Pediculus humanus corporis ) that infests the body and clothes of human beings.
sentences.cn: 一种寄生的昆虫 ( 体虱虱属 ),寄生在人的身体或衣服上.

sentences.en: Always she feared lest some louse had escaped her.
sentences.cn: 她总是害怕有个虱子逃过了他的惩处.

sentences.en: Anyway, I belonged to another hierarchy. They wouldn't even share louse with the likes of me.
sentences.cn: 总之我是属于另一阶层的, 他们甚至不愿同我这种人分享一只虱子.

sentences.en: Dick, s weak guinea pig kicked Mike's quick louse.
sentences.cn: 迪克那只虚弱的天竺鼠踢了麦克那只动作敏捷的扁蚤.

sentences.en: Neem, olive oil, tea tree oil etc, which can be used for treating louse.
sentences.cn: 印楝, 橄榄油, 茶树油等, 可用于治疗头虱.

sentences.en: Only humans carry this particular species of louse, which lays its eggs in clothing.
sentences.cn: 根据德国的研究人员表示,虱子为衣服的发展史提供了洞察线索.

sentences.en: The bloodsucking louse also transmits various commutable diseases such as endemic typhus, trench fever relapsing fever.
sentences.cn: 虱吸血还可传播各种流行病,体虱被认为是传播流行性斑疹伤寒 、 回归热和战壕热的主要媒介.

sentences.en: The carpenter up the joints of the table which had become louse.
sentences.cn: 木匠用螺丝钉把桌子上松动的木榫头固定.

sentences.en: The louse is a lousing , and so on.
sentences.cn: 虱子就是虱子, 等等.

sentences.en: This louse devastated European vineyards between 1860 and 1880 and its descendants are now ravaging Californian grape vines.
sentences.cn: 这种虫害在1860年到1880年间毁灭了欧洲葡萄园,而它们的后代现在也给加州的葡萄秧造成损害.

sentences.en: You're not sentimental, you're just a louse.
sentences.cn: 你不是感性, 只是卑鄙的家伙.

words.tran_cn: 虱子；寄生虫；卑鄙的家伙

trans.tran_cn: 虱子，寄生虫，卑鄙的家伙
trans.tran_en: a small insect that lives on the hair or skin of people or animals
